import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { navbarOpen = false; toggleNavbar() { this.navbarOpen = !this.navbarOpen; } }
